column3: Latest;Phnom Penh: Police at the Immigration Department detained 15 Chinese and Vietnamese nationals in a hotel (*initial reporting from the scene yesterday said a condo building).------The arrests were made on the afternoon of November 18
column9: Phnom Penh.------A total of 15 Chinese and Vietnamese nationals were found and arrested.Â Two Vietnamese women who are accused of illegally crossing the border to stay and work in the Kingdom were referred to the Immigration Department for questioning and enforcement. It is not clear why the Chinese nationals were detained. ------TDN
